meanings.definition: A panel under the windshield of a vehicle that contains gauges and controls.
meanings.sent1: The dashboard in the car shows how fast we are going.
meanings.sent2: I checked the dashboard to see if the gas tank was full.
meanings.sent3: When the dashboard lights up, it's like a colorful dance party.
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up her face like a dashboard lighting up at night.
meanings.sent5: The dashboard, with its glowing numbers, looked like a spaceship control panel.

meanings.definition: A screen on a computer or electronic device that displays information or controls.
meanings.sent1: The dashboard on my computer shows the weather forecast.
meanings.sent2: I customized the dashboard on my phone to have my favorite apps.
meanings.sent3: The dashboard on the tablet made it seem like a magical device.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were glued to the dashboard, absorbing all the data.
meanings.sent5: The dashboard on the smartwatch was like having a tiny computer on my wrist.
